resources:
// Application StudOn \"Access storage\" permission:
Used for saving downloads on the sd-card.

Grant permission later:
If you do not permit this now, you can do it later. Then, please open \"Settings -> Grant permission\". Share using: // StudOn Red Pink Purple Blue Teal Green Lime Yellow Orange Brown // Login Username Link of your StudOn instance Password Automatic login (IDM) Please fill in login data Login failed! // Bookmarks Delete Delete Bookmark? Start site Edit New title… Bookmark saved Bookmark already exists Icon // Menu Items Bookmarks Menu Next Previous Cancel search Share Exit Save Print Settings Downloads Search Open in Browser // Settings Login data (IDM) Enter your IDM login data. It will be filled in automatically. Please delete unused bookmarks after editing your data. Learn more about the app. Pin (App access) Set a pin to protect app against unwanted access. Only use numbers. // SnackBar OK Cancel Downloading file: Download: Download completed. Open file? Wrong password No printer found Cannot go back Cannot go forward External link. Open in default browser? // Dialogs Help Bookmarks
\u25AA Click to open entry.
\u25AA Long press to edit entry.
\u25AA Long press navigation button to open bookmarks.

Swipe
Swipe on the toolbar or navigation button:
\u25AA left/right to go back/forward in history.
\u25AA top/bottom to scroll to top/bottom of website. Copyright © 2020 by AOSD Forked from https://github.com/scoute-dich/HHSMoodle
For more information visit: https://github.com/asdoi/StudOn

https://github.com/javiersantos/AppUpdater Name Icon Enter search term // Password Only numbers Pin forgotten? Reset app data? Sorting Sort bookmarks by name or icon. Columns Number of columns in bookmark list and menu. External link Show a dialog to open external links in default browser. Swipe gestures Open your local messages on left swipe and the navigation drawer on right swipe. Dark mode Will use the dark mode for displaying websites, if system uses dark mode. This works only, if latest webview is installed on device. Some useful hints for using the app. Press again to exit Authentication error: Authentication failed Biometric unlock Unlock the app with your fingerprint or your device credentials. Biometric unlock of StudOn app Unlock using your biometric credential Confirm Downloads Show a confirmation dialog before starting downloads. Later Download the latest version with the latest features, improvements, and bug fixes. Summary
